sentence.Network_en: The synthesizing of dimethyl methyl phosphonic acid ester with trimethyl phosphite was catalyzed by methyl alkylbenzenesulfonate.
sentence.Network_cn: 报道了以烷基苯磺酸甲酯催化异构亚磷酸三甲酯合成甲基膦酸二甲酯.
